Description:
I get this error when trying to view the Thumbnail demo page: System does not support thumbnails: no JDK image support  and This installation can not generate thumbnails: no image support in Java runtime.

I followed the instructions given and changed the JAVA_OPTS variable as said to: JAVA_OPTS=-Djava.awt.headless=true nevertheless it won't display either.

I browsed many JIRA issue reports but found nothing else.

Any advice on how to solve this?

Standalone with Tomcat.
JDK 1.4.2_10
Linux cancana3 2.4.18-3 #1 Thu Apr 18 07:37:53 EDT 2002 i686 unknown
Creator: Javier Gallego
